title: ApoC-III and ectopic fat accumulation in individuals with type 2 diabetes: an exploratory analysis from the MEDEA randomised controlled study.
abstract: We aimed to investigate the effects of an isoenergetic multifactorial diet, previously shown to reduce liver and pancreatic fat content, compared with a monounsaturated fatty acid (MUFA)-rich diet, on plasma apolipoprotein C-III (ApoC-III) levels and their relationship with ectopic fat and beta cell function in people with type 2 diabetes.
